creator: adasilva@mini-annonces.com
text:
This command should connect to https:// not http:// as it is apache-ssl.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

prod:~# apache-sslctl status

Looking up localhost
localhost
Making HTTP connection to localhost
Alert!: Unable to connect to remote host.

lynx: Can't access startfile http://localhost/server-status

-----------------------------------------------------------------

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
Please open a report at the bugtracker of your distribution. We don't maintain a
script called apache-sslctl here.

Thanks.
